name: Twins Candy
description:
From the studio that brought you Dalton the Awesome and Wave: Against Every Beat!, Crazy Parachute, Magic Balls Island comes the next hit game, Twins Candy!

With Twins Candy, the goal is very simple, you clear all sweet tiles like candy, cake, ice-cream to earn high score and step to a bigger challenge each new level.

Gameplay:
. Select tiles with the same picture and they will disappear.
. You can only connect tiles that are touching or can be connected within 3 straight lines.

With an innovative scoring system and cute art, this is one game not to be missed!

Features:

- Challenging falling mechanic with cute artwork in retina display graphic!

- Simple tap control makes Twins Candy easy to play and hard to master!

- Train your eyes!

- Complete objectives to multiply your high scores!

- OpenFeint support (Online Leaderboards & Achievements)!
